DOC.brief_summary: The Purpose of this study is to report a new single portal endoscopic release technique and the sequence of the first 50 patients who underwent this release. This will be a chart review of the demographics, outcomes, and complications of a sequential series of patients undergoing a Seg-Way Endoscopic carpal tunnel release (ECTR).
DOC.brief_title: Consecutive Series Outcomes Review of Patients Undergoing a New Single Portal Technique for Endoscopic Carpal Tunnel Release
DOC.criteria: This will be a chart review of the first 50 patients who have had surgery using the single portal technique
